info.name: GMail Dark Theme
info.description: Modifies GMail's dark theme to give it some character, make some features more visible, etc.
info.additionalInfo:
Update: 2012/08/05: The right sidebar provides some GMail features like Contact info, etc.  However, I just noticed that below the features is a large area of ads!  This tweak removes the ads, and hopefully ONLY the ads.

Original note: As far as I know, all of the classes and ids in GMail's markup are undocumented.  From tinkering, it seems that there is a consistency, but everything in this stylesheet is the result of trial and error.

Needless to say, this is a work in progress and only the first version.
